page.title: 10PITSFORD VILLAGE SHOPKEEPER
page.content: IN ADDITION TO THE ACTUAL SHOP, MY LIVING ACCOMMODATION IS ALSO IN THIS BUILDING.THE UPSTAIRS FLAT IS QUITE SMALL BUT COMFORTABLE AND VERY NICE. SINCE COMING HERE TWO YEARS AGO I HAVE FOUND THE VILLAGERS TO BE VERY NICE, FRIENDLY AND KIND. BECAUSE THE SHOP IS A GENERAL STORE I SELL ANYTHING FROM EGGS AND BACON TO SCOURERS AND FURNITURE POLISH. I DO NOT HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT TRANSPORT TO WORK AS I LIVE OVER THE SHOP, BUT I DO HAVE TO GO TO THE WHOLESALE WAREHOUSE OCCASIONALLY IN ORDER TO RESTOCK THE SHELVES FOR MY CUSTOMERS. THE SHOP IS OPEN FROM 9-00 A.M. UNTIL 5-30 P.M. DAILY EXCEPT ON THURSDAYS AND SATURDAYS WHEN I CLOSE AT MID-DAY. THESE TWO HALF-DAYS AND THE WHOLE OF SUNDAY GIVE ME SOME LEISURE TIME IN WHICH TO READ OR TAKE A WALK BY THE RESERVOIR AND ENJOY ITS BEAUTY & PEACE
